amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-791 to direct the Victims of Communism Memorial Foundation to periodically update their curriculum, and to include the ongoing human rights abuses and aggression against democratic values by the People's Republic of China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manning amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Manning amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
